channel.title: NPC Attack Glitch
channel.description:
[font=Century Gothic]Hey,
Well my NPC's have a couple major attacking glitches that I hope you all can help me with!
[b]Question 1:[/b] The first is that when you attack an NPC he will just stand there and face your direction (Image A), and will not follow you to attack you back. I want to know if theres a way to make him follow you and attack you back, but without noclipping, or I don't want him to follow the player all the way back to Varrock or something. (P.S. I have set walking coords so he is allowed to walk around.)
[b]Question 2:[/b]The second is that an NPC will not give up. For example I attacked the NPC and died (I was teleported to respawn area). The NPC still faced me even though I was atleast 1,000 cords away. When I came back he was still facing me, and my friend (Image A) was attacking him. He wouldn't give-up on me, therefore my friend a lvl 30 killed a lvl 86, because the Fire Giant never attacked him back, because he wouldn't "give-up" on me. How do I make the Giant "Give-Up", and attack someone else if he is attacked by that person?
[b]Image A:[/b] [img]http://img246.imageshack.us/img246/4880/glitch.png[/img][br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 07, 2009, 01:28:21 pm[/size][hr]Anyone please, I realy need help with this!
